description: Barberry (Berberis stenophylla 'Corallina Compacta') is an amazing shrub worthy of any garden. It boasts fantastic dark-green foliage which, in autumn, turns to warm tones of purple, pink and orange. It grows to a bushy and compact size, reaching 1-2 feet tall, and requires very little maintenance. Its sweet-scented yellow blooms in spring bring a splash of color and its bright red berries attract a variety of birds and insects. Drought-tolerant and pest-resistant, this hardy shrub is great for inexperienced gardeners and perfect for borders, low hedges, rockeries and containers. Inspire your garden with its striking foliage and delightful fragrant flowers.
